ProductInfo.Features:
Easy to use and carry. Plug and play without driver installation. Powered by USB port.
Used to check and watch internal situation. Sensor: 1/6 CMOS Image Sensor. Pixels: 1/6 VGA COMS (640 X 480) Pixels. View angle: 52 degrees. Diameter: approx 15mm. Build-in 5 white LED lights.Flexible tube.
Waterproof Camera meet IP66 standard. Cable length: 6 meters. Automatic white balance, automatic exposure. Brightness, contrast, hue and chorma can be adjusted.
USB 2.1 Interface. Suitable for laptops and desktop computers.
Package Included: 1 x USB Endoscope, 1 x User Manual, 1 x CD Drives.
ProductInfo.Name: USB Flexible Endoscope Borescope Video Inspection Camera (5M, Resolution: 640 x 480, VGA 300k Pixels)
